properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel; Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Little Creek VA
properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 11 at 2:24PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt. Gusts up to 35 kt possible. Waves 2 to 4
ft.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from New Point Comfort to Cape Henry VA
including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, from midnight tonight to 7
AM EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
